not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012. Mr. Mike Pence ruled out a White House bid in a letter to supporters that also fueled speculation he is instead planning a run for governor. We have been especially humbled by the confidence and support of those who believe we should pursue the presidency, but after much deliberation and prayer, we believe our calling is closer to home, Mr. Mike Pence wrote in the letter.`` In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana. We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012.''

He added that Mr Page would`` merge Google's technology and business vision'', while he would stay on to focus on external issues, like deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships . At an upscale hotel in Dallas Texas a top official in the city of Dallas gave the key to the city to Michael Vick . In a gushing like a school girl with a crush display he hands over the key to Michael Vick . On Monday morning the Mayor of Dallas demanded it back. ( AFP)- British Prime Minister David Cameron has been damaged by his media chief's resignation over phone-hacking at a tabloid newspaper he headed and the row is unlikely to go away, commentators said Saturday. So far, our worst day in government, a senior aide from David Cameron 's Downing Street office told The Guardian, after Andy Coulson quit as chief of communications on Friday. The left-wing newspaper added that Andy Coulson 's departure`` leaves the prime minister with a

He added: Ownership and use of these weapons is perfectly legal but what is neither legal nor morally acceptable is to go around firing them randomly at animals. Simon Cowell is urging the police to investigate such incidents thoroughly and he has asked them to issue warnings to the public not to fire air-guns at wild animals in any circumstances. suggestion of bankruptcy protection. California Treasurer Bill Lockyer told Reuters Insider on Monday that states may not need the same freedom to declare bankruptcy as major companies because they have a guaranteed source of revenue. The major difference, of course, is that we're looking at sovereign governments that have the ability to enact a tax, and that's not the case of these private corporations that may have unfunded obligations that they can't deal with, he said. North America president Mark Reuss and Chrysler's Mr. Sergio Marchionne all promise not to fall back into the trap of making too many cars and then slapping huge discounts on the vehicles to move metal off dealer lots. This has been the heart of the problem in Detroit, said Mr. Sergio Marchionne , who also heads up Fiat, the Italian auto company.
